```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
visual_data <-readRDS("visual_data.rds")
```

```{r}
shots_hist <- ggplot(visual_data, aes(team_fga)) +
    geom_histogram(bins = 30,
                   color = "black",
                   fill = "lightblue") +
    labs(x = "Team Field Goal Attempts",
         y = "Count",
         title = "Distribution of FGAs") +
    theme_classic()

shots_hist
```

```{r}
team_shots_box <- ggplot(visual_data, aes(x = team_fga, 
                                          y = team_display, 
                                          fill = as.factor(team_display))) +
    geom_boxplot(color = "black") +
    labs(y = "Team Name",
         x = "Team Field Goal Attempts",
         title = "Boxplots of Team FGAs",
         fill = "Team") +
    theme_classic()

team_shots_box
```

```{r}
fgpct_to_pts <- ggplot(visual_data, aes(x = team_efgpct,
                                        y = team_offrating,
                                        color = team_display)) +
    geom_point() +
    labs(x = "Effective Field Goal Percentage",
         y = "Team Offensive Rating",
         title = "3PA vs Offensive Rating",
         color = "Team Name") +
    theme_classic()

fgpct_to_pts
```
